author: doogie
msg: Don't define a fileset; instead separately define the extra source
selector, and the dir to scan.

author: doogie
msg: In _src-extra-set, convert the implicit patternset list to a nested <or>

author: doogie
msg: With <if> always available, _src-extra-set can be defined at the
top-level, without having to wait until some target is run.
